
# Faults

A fault is as an abnormal condition that affects a system component and which may lead to a failure.

| Fault type                                                                                                            | Description                                 |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------- |
| gRPC Fault                       | Fault affecting gRPC requests from a target |
| HTTP Fault                       | Fault affecting HTTP requests from a target |
| Pod Termination Fault | Fault terminating a number of target Pods   |
